name: CodePipelinePipelineStagesActionsOutputArtifacts
description: OutputArtifacts is a property of the AWS CodePipeline Pipeline Stages Actions property that specifies an artifact that is the result of an AWS CodePipeline action, such as a test or build artifact.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the artifact that is the result of an AWS CodePipeline action, such as My App. Output artifact names must be unique within a pipeline.
